documents.name: Privacy
documents.text:
Max Kohler Visual Communication November 18, 2021 1.1 minutes Privacy

This website is built, written and maintained by me (Max Kohler). You can reach me via email at hi@maxkoehler.com.

Analytics

This site places cookies and collects no analytics data at all. It does not use Google Analytics or other any third-party analytics software. Your IP address is not recorded.

Embedded Content

Some pages may contain embedded content (videos, images, etc.) from other websites. Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website. These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged into that website.

Because this is the case, I only display embedded content with your specific consent. I don't remember what choice you make.

Email Newsletter

My email newsletter is powered by Tinyletter from Mailchimp. If you choose to subsribe, Mailchimp's privacy policy and terms of use apply.

Source Code

The source code for this website is available on Github. This Document was last updated on November 18, 2021. You can view all earlier versions of this document on Github.

points.title: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes
The terms for this service are easy to read
IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked
Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time
There is a date of the last update of the agreements
No third-party analytics or tracking platforms are used
The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers
